author: slava77
body:
https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/20558#issuecomment-337464046

in PU 200 the total of 4 nb[12]  modules is more than full tracking time.
This can be re-enabled once adjusted to acceptable time or optimized in some other way.

@rappoccio 
a prompt alternative for this is welcome
title: disable ecorr computations in phase-2 because they are too slow for high-PU
